title: What is the GCrypto Trading Wallet?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [How can I withdraw from my GCrypto Trading Wallet?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31304830152089-How-can-I-withdraw-from-my-GCrypto-Trading-Wallet)
- [How much are the transaction limits for the GCrypto Trading Wallet?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31303981320473-How-much-are-the-transaction-limits-for-the-GCrypto-Trading-Wallet)
- [What is the GCrypto Trading Wallet?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31303868127897-What-is-the-GCrypto-Trading-Wallet)
- [How can I top up my GCrypto Trading Wallet?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/10200245771545-How-can-I-top-up-my-GCrypto-Trading-Wallet)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

The GCrypto Trading Wallet is a separate wallet designed for trading cryptocurrency and is **different from your regular GCash wallet**. It allows you to:

- Convert PHP to crypto and crypto back to PHP
- Manage your funds for crypto transactions

![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/41424540269977)

### **How to Track Your GCrypto Transactions:**

- Check your **GCash App Inbox** and **GCash Transaction History** for any top-up or withdrawal confirmation.
- To view your crypto assets, tap **Portfolio**

**Reminders:**

- You _cannot_ directly transfer or buy crypto using your GCash Wallet
- To buy crypto, you need to [top up your GCrypto Trading Wallet](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/10200245771545-Top-up-GCrypto-Trading-Wallet) first

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [How much are the transaction limits for the GCrypto Trading Wallet?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31303981320473-GCrypto-Trading-Wallet-Limits)

- [How can I buy crypto in GCrypto?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/9781977718425-Buy-crypto-with-GCrypto)
- [How can I top up my GCrypto Trading Wallet?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/10200245771545-Top-up-GCrypto-Trading-Wallet)
